Home » 40P14 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 7 Sappaccayadukādi
7.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Sappaccayadukādi
Paṭiccādivāra
9.
30Sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
31Hetuyā ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ.
10.
32Sappaccayo dhammo naappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
33Appaccayo dhammo naappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
34Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā dve…pe…  upanissaye dve…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhataṃ sappaccayasadisaṃ.)
